sentences.en: Both women vehemently deny the charges against them.
sentences.cn: 两名妇女都激烈地否认了对她们的指控.

sentences.en: Don't imagine you can deny that.
He had the hardihood to deny the fact.
He has the confidence to deny it.
He tried to deny it. Shame on him!
I would not want to deny them a harmless pleasure.
sentences.cn: 我不想剥夺他们这点无伤大雅的乐趣。

sentences.en: It is absurd that they ( should ) deny my request.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝我的要求是荒唐的.

sentences.en: Jack had the hardihood to deny what he has done.
sentences.cn: 杰克厚颜地否认了自己所干的事.

sentences.en: She can deny her son nothing.
sentences.cn: 她对儿子是百依百顺(要什么就给什么).

sentences.en: The department denies responsibility for what occurred.
sentences.cn: 这个部门拒绝为所发生的事承担责任。

sentences.en: The government denied the existence of poverty among 16- and 17-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 政府否认十六七岁的青少年当中存在贫困问题。

sentences.en: The White House was swift to deny the rumours.
sentences.cn: 白宫立刻对这些传言予以否认。

sentences.en: They appeared at court yesterday to deny charges of murder.
sentences.cn: 他们昨天出庭，否认谋杀的指控。

sentences.en: They falsify or deny whatever doesn't suit their books.
sentences.cn: 他们篡改或者否定任何不符合他们意见的东西.

sentences.en: They totally and categorically deny the charges.
sentences.cn: 他们彻底而又坚决地否认了那些指控。

sentences.en: Who can deny his stature as the world's greatest cellist?
sentences.cn: 谁能否认他是世界上最伟大的大提琴演奏家呢？

words.tran_cn: 可否认的；可拒绝的；可否定的

phrases.tran_cn: deny someone something 拒绝给予

trans.tran_cn: 否认，拒绝承认，戒绝(尤因道德或宗教原因)，拒绝给予
trans.tran_en: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something

trans.tran_cn: 否认， 不承认； 拒绝给予， 拒绝…的要求
trans.tran_en: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something
